Description.Text:
Property Location
Apartamentos Casablanca is in the heart of Puerto de la Cruz, walking distance from Sitio Litre Garden and Mirador de La Paz. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Lago Martianez Swimming Pools and Botanical Garden of La Orotava.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 287 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as separate sitting areas and microwaves.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. This apartment also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and an arcade/game room.

Dining
Grab a bite from a snack bar/deli serving guests of Apartamentos Casablanca. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite from a snack bar/deli serving guests of Apartamentos Casablanca. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Apartamentos Casablanca is in the heart of Puerto de la Cruz, walking distance from Sitio Litre Garden and Mirador de La Paz. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Lago Martianez Swimming Pools and Botanical Garden of La Orotava.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sitio Litre Garden - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Mirador de La Paz - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Lago Martianez Swimming Pools - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Botanical Garden of La Orotava - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Taoro Park - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Risco Belle Aquatic Gardens - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Church of Nuestra Senora de la Pena de Francia - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Casino Puerto de la Cruz - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Ermita de San Juan - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Plaza del Charco - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Castillo San Felipe - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Garden Beach - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Pueblo Chico - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Loro Parque - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Bollullo Beach - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi

The preferred airport for Apartamentos Casablanca is Tenerife (TFS-Tenerife South) - 40.8 km / 25.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Apartamentos Casablanca is Tenerife (TFS-Tenerife South) - 41 km / 25.5 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.5 mile and kilometre.
